column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I guess we were fortunate that she returned a few minutes later saying that the chef agreed my husband's over cooked steak was in fact over cooked.  Within just a few minutes
column2: a new steak was brought out...again over done (though not as over as the first one).  Given that my entree was getting cold
column3: my husband decided to just accept it...but of course two over done steaks priced at $60 are unacceptable.
